title: WTB T205 Young, Johnson, Mathewson, Speaker
author: markf31

posts.post_title: WTB T205 Young, Johnson, Mathewson, Speaker
posts.post_content:
I am looking for any of the following players, I would ideally like SGC 40 but I will consider SGC 30s and 50s.

Cy Young
Walter Johnson
Christy Mathewson ACQUIRED
Tris Speaker

Thanks and I look forward to making some deals.
There was a really nice looking PSA 4 Matty the ended on eBay with no bids.. For what I thought was a pretty fair opening bid price.  May be worth contacting the seller if you're interested.
